Name: A Dream to Be
Ingredients: 3 dash Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Drier than the ingredients might suggest.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2016 by Leon Back at Panda and Sons , Edinburgh for Jack Daniel's Tennessee Calling competition.
Nutrition: One serving of A Dream to Be contains 198 calories
